item.title: Warsaw's liberal mayor narrowly wins Polish presidential vote
item.description: Rafal Trzaskowski is set to face conservative historian Karol Nawrocki in a second round run-off.

item.title: Watch: Cat caught smuggling drugs into Costa Rica prison
item.description: The feline was found carrying 235.65g of marijuana and 67.76g of heroin, authorities say.

item.title: Kenya's ex-justice minister 'deported' from Tanzania
item.description: Karua was allowed into Tanzania last month but was stopped ahead of Tundu Lissu's latest court appearance.

item.title: 'A pain I can't describe': Tornadoes sweep multiple US states
item.description: Dozens of people have died in parts of the United States after tornadoes caused catastrophic damage across the weekend.

item.title: Liberal mayor Dan beats nationalist in tense race for Romanian presidency
item.description: Nicusor Dan fights off a strong challenge from a right-wing nationalist after months of political turbulence.
